ing: 1 cup vegan mayonnaise (such as Follow Your HeartÂ® VeganaiseÂ®)
1 tablespoon agave nectar, or more to taste
des: "I adore Newman's OwnÂ® Southwest salad dressing from McDonald'sÂ®. Sadly it's not available at any stores (that I can find). Play around to make it taste as you remember it. Enjoy!"
ins: Blend vegan mayonnaise, water, agave nectar, vinegar, chili powder, garlic powder, onion powder, cumin, lime juice, and cayenne pepper in a blender until smooth. Keep refrigerated in an airtight container for 5 to 7 days.
